title: Changelog file for packages in rush which should be published
description: This file represents a JSON format of changelog of a package

entries.description: Entries within the changelog corresponding to each published version.

IChangeLogComment.description: Interface representing a single changelog comment within an entry.

author.description: The author, if applicable, that created the change request.

commit.description: The commit, if applicable, including the change request.

customFields.description: An optional dictionary of custom string fields.

IChangeLogEntry.description: Interface representing a single published entry in the changelog.

comments.description: Comments for the entry, where key represents the ChangeType string (Example: major)

date.description: The UTC date when the publish was applied. (Example: Fri, 02 Dec 2016 22:27:16 GMT)

tag.description: Git tag used to identify the published commit. (Example: b7f55611e54910327a206476b185265498c66acf)

IChangeLogEntryComments.description: Interface representing a single published entry in the changelog.

dependency.description: Describes changes to the package's dependencies

hotfix.description: Describe changes that do not have version information

major.description: Describes changes which cause a major-level SemVer bump

minor.description: Describes changes which cause a minor-level SemVer bump

none.description: Describe changes that do not have version information

patch.description: Describes changes which cause a patch-level SemVer bump
